The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 95 , at Wells Fargo Center on Sunday evening . The Sixers ( 17 - 8 ) came in to Sunday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive , as they 'd lost three of their last four games . However , they 've now won five of their last seven games , and they have now won three of their last four games . They were led by J.J. Redick 's 24 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds and three assists . Joel Embiid was right behind him with a 15 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , a steal and a block . Marc Gasol had a near double - double with 12 points , four rebounds , three assists , a steal and a pair of blocks . Garrett Temple paced the bench with 12 points , four rebounds and an assist . The Grizzlies remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Memphis to take on the Clippers on Wednesday night .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Washington Wizards , 132 - 115 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday evening . The Sixers ( 27 - 14 ) checked in to Tuesday 's contest with only seven road wins in 17 tries away from Barclays Center , but the Sixers ( 16 - 25 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest with only seven road wins in 17 tries away from Barclays Center . However , the Sixers ( 16 - 25 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest with only seven road wins in 17 tries away from Barclays Center , and they 'd now won three of their last four games . However , they 've certainly found their groove over the last two games , limiting the Sixers ( 16 - 25 ) to 50 percent shooting overall , and a 44 percent figure from three - point range . They also elicited 16 turnovers from the Wizards ( 16 - 25 ) , while limiting them to 50 and 44 percent figures in those categories . The Sixers were led by Landry Shamet 's 29 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Jeff Green was next with 15 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Sam Dekker led the bench with 14 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Ben McConnell generated nine points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Jimmy Butler paced the Sixers with 20 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Ben McConnell filled out the stat sheet with nine points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Ian Mahinmi was next with 10 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal . Bradley Beal led the way for the visitors with 28 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Landry Simmons followed with 17 points , nine assists , five rebounds and three steals . Ben McConnell filled out the stat sheet with nine points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Otto Porter , Jr. provided 11 points , two steals , one rebound , one assist and two steals . Wilson Chandler was productive as a reserve as well with two points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . The 76ers head back home to face off with the Washington 76ers on Wednesday night , while the Sixers head to Washington to tangle with the Wizards on Wednesday evening as well .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 121 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Hawks ( 13 - 29 ) checked in to Friday 's contest with only seven road wins in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , and they 'd also lost three of their last four games . However , they were able to pull out a hard - fought victory against one of the best defensive units in the league . Jimmy Butler led the way with a game - high 30 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , five assists and three steals . Ben McConnell was next with 16 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon was next with a bench - leading 19 points , along with eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Alex Len was next with a near double - double of nine points , six rebounds , two blocks and two blocks . John Bembry was next with 14 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Miami Heat , 106 - 102 , at Wells Fargo Center on Thursday evening . The Heat ( 26 - 31 ) came in to Thursday 's contest with only seven road wins in 17 tries away from Barclays Center , but the Sixers ( 26 - 21 ) were able to pull away in the fourth quarter on a mission . The Heat ( 26 - 21 ) jumped out to a 29 - 21 lead after one quarter , but the Heat ( 26 - 31 ) battled back to make it a two - point game with four minutes to go . However , the Heat ( 26 - 31 ) came storming back in the second half , outscoring the Heat ( 26 - 31 ) by a 29 - 21 margin over the final 12 minutes . Philadelphia was led by Tobias Harris 's 23 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds , an assist and a block . Dion Waiters followed with 18 points , five rebounds , an assist and three steals . Jimmy Butler was next with 18 points , six rebounds , six assists and a steal . Boban Marjanovic was next with 19 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a block . J.J. Redick was next with 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and a block . T.J. McConnell supplied six points , five assists , two rebounds and three steals . Dwyane Wade paced the Heat with 19 points , six assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Dion Waiters followed with 18 points , five rebounds , one assist and three steals . Hassan Whiteside was next with four points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and two blocks . Kelly Olynyk was productive in a reserve role as well with 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Heat remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again on Saturday night versus the Detroit Pistons .

The Sixers ( 36 - 23 ) checked in to Saturday 's contest with only five road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , but the Sixers ( 38 - 23 ) came in to Saturday 's contest with only five road wins in 24 tries away from Barclays Center . However , the Trail Blazers ( 38 - 23 ) came in to Saturday 's contest with only five road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , and the Sixers ( 38 - 22 ) came in to Saturday 's contest with only five road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center . However , the Trail Blazers ( 38 - 22 ) were able to pull away in the second half , outscoring the Sixers ( 38 - 22 ) by a 41 - 25 margin over the final 12 minutes . However , the Trail Blazers ( 38 - 22 ) came storming back in the second half , outscoring their visitors by a 59 - 46 margin over the second and third periods . The Sixers were led by a pair of 20 - point efforts from Lillard and Lillard , with the former adding eight assists , six rebounds and one steal , and the latter supplying eight boards , four assists and one steal . Tobias Harris led the bench with 20 points , eight rebounds and one block . Enes Kanter led the bench with 16 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Jusuf Nurkic contributed a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu was productive as a reserve as well with 15 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Trail Blazers remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Monday .

However , Joel Embiid answered with a driving layup with just over two seconds remaining in regulation to knot the score at 108 - 108 . Toronto was led by Fred VanVleet 's 18 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Serge Ibaka was next with 16 points , four rebounds , one assist , four blocks and two steals . Justin Holiday was next in line with 12 points , four rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Greg Monroe paced the bench with seven points , three rebounds and two assists . The Raptors remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Tuesday .

However , it was a forgettable shooting night for Toronto , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . They also elicited 13 turnovers from the Bulls , and were led by Serge Ibaka 's 23 points , which he supplemented with 12 rebounds , two assists and a block . Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot posted a 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and two blocks . Marc Gasol had a near double - double with 17 points , eight boards , six assists and a block . Fred VanVleet led the bench with 23 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Jodie Meeks led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and one steal . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Monday night , while the Raptors remain home to face the Orlando Magic on Monday evening as well .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 0 - 4 ) 102 - 86 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Nets got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 24 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Nets were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 44 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 17 percent from deep . The Nets were led by D'Angelo Russell , who went 5 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 18 points , while also adding eight assists and eight rebounds . It was his second strong performance in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 14 assists over his last two games . Kevin Love recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Joe Harris , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) , six rebounds and two assists . The Nets were led by Jordan Clarkson , who went 4 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 14 points , while also adding five rebounds and three assists . It was a new season - high in points for Clarkson , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Tristan Thompson , who finished with 11 points ( 1 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and 11 rebounds in 23 minutes . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was J.R. Smith , who finished with seven points ( 3 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and one rebound . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Detroit to play the Pistons on Thursday .

The New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 22 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 8 - 32 ) 133 - 98 on Saturday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 28 - 26 right away in the first quarter . The Pelicans were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . The Pelicans shot 58 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers finished at 41 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans were led by Jordan Clarkson , who went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . It was a season - high in points for Clarkson , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get back on track . Julius Randle also had a strong showing , finishing with 22 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 21 points and 12 rebounds per game . Tristan Thompson posted a double - double of his own with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Channing Frye , who came off the bench for eight points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and two assists . The Cavaliers were led by Jrue Holiday , who went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding five rebounds . It was his second straight game with 22 points , pushing his season average to 18 points per game . Jalen on the other hand went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding five rebounds . It was his second straight game with 10 points , pushing his season average to 10 points per game . Jalen on the other hand shot 7 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Channing Frye , who came off the bench for eight points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and two assists . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday .

He 's been on a roll of late , averaging 30 points and 10 rebounds over his last three games . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 131 - 117 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate the two in the box score . Both teams shot very efficiently , as they both shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Memphis recording 32 assists to 16 turnovers , while Atlanta matched their assists and turnovers at 19 a piece . The Grizzlies also took advantage of the whistle , going 30 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Atlanta went just 21 - of - 36 . The Grizzlies ( 0 - 2 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how good they can be . Garrett Temple had one of the best games of his career though , as he led the team with 30 points , four rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 11 shooting off the bench . Mike Conley recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points , four rebounds and 11 assists . Taurean Prince came off the bench to provide 28 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Washington Wizards , 107 - 95 , at FedEx Forum on Tuesday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate these two in the box score . In fact , there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Memphis recording 28 assists to 15 turnovers , while Washington matched their assists and turnovers at 20 a piece . The Grizzlies also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Washington , while committing two less turnovers . The Grizzlies ( 4 - 2 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just why . John Wall was the player of the game , as he accumulated 22 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Garrett Temple was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and seven rebounds on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Bradley Beal accumulated 17 points , three rebounds , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . Memphis will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Utah Jazz .

They were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . It was a season - high in points for Mejri , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . The Atlanta Hawks ( 19 - 38 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 28 - 29 ) 117 - 113 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came out and got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 38 - 32 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 43 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were led by Brandon Ingram , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . Trae on the other hand went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 19 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . It was a season - high in points for Ingram , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get back on track . Rajon Rondo also played a big factor in the win . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Dewayne Dedmon added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and one block . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Knicks on Thursday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Houston Rockets on Thursday .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 28 - 49 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 57 - 20 ) 136 - 135 on Sunday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came out and got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 26 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 44 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks finished at 41 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from deep . The Hawks also secured a 58 - 71 rebounding advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by Justin Anderson , who went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds over that span . Tim Len had a strong showing as well . He went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and a career - high of 23 points . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . George Hill also had a strong showing , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and one assist . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 10 rebounds over that span . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Vince Carter added nine points ( 3 - 11 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 19 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday , while the Bucks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Monday .

The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Miami , while committing six less turnovers . The Miami Heat defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 74 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was a wire - to - wire win for Miami , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Heat , as they held the Pistons to 35 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Miami winning that battle , 51 - 37 . Detroit ( 34 - 33 ) had to play this game without James Johnson ( ankle ) and they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to pull out a win . Blake Griffin was the player of the game , as he collected 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Dion Waiters was second on the team , as he accrued 14 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 10 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Detroit 's next game is on Friday , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers .

The Miami Heat defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 93 - 75 , at American Airlines Arena on Sunday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was tight throughout , as there were 11 ties and 11 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Miami recording 25 assists to 11 turnovers , while Charlotte committed just 11 turnovers to just 11 assists . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 55 - 44 . Charlotte ( 31 - 38 ) have now won eight of their last 11 games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Goran Dragic was the player of the game , as he accumulated 19 points , two rebounds and four assists . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 12 points , four rebounds and three assists . Dwyane Wade was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , eight rebounds and two assists .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 23 - 27 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 40 ) 114 - 90 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 24 - 20 right away in the first quarter . The Mavericks were able to shoot 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 41 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks also forced the Knicks into 14 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by Harrison Barnes , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding four rebounds and two assists . He 's been on a roll of late , averaging 21 points and 6 rebounds over his last three games . Wesley Matthews also had a solid showing . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding two rebounds and an assist . It was his second straight game with 17 points , pushing his season average to 11 points per game . Trey Burke also had a solid game off the bench . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding three assists in 32 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Burke , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him turn things around . Dirk Nowitzki had 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with two rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second straight game with 14 points , pushing his season average to 12 points per game . Coming off the bench , Mario Hezonja chipped in with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , two rebounds , two steals and one assist . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Thursday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday .

The Pistons got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 36 - 28 right away in the first quarter . The Pistons were able to hold on for the victory , as they came into this game riding a five - game winning streak . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this one , going 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 40 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were led by Blake Griffin , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding six rebounds and eight assists . He 's now averaging 19 points and 7 assists on the season . Reggie Jackson had a strong showing as well . He went 5 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 assists on the season . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Mitchell Mitchell , Kevin Seraphin had a strong showing . He went 4 - for - 6 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 8 points , while also adding eight rebounds and five blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Wesley Matthews , who came off the bench for nine points ( 2 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , five assists and a steal . The Knicks were led by Blake Griffin , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding six rebounds and eight assists . It was his second game in a row with 20 or more points , as he 's now averaging 19 points and 7 assists on the year . Reggie Jackson had a strong showing as well , finishing with 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) and seven assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 assists on the season . The only other Piston to reach double figures in points was Kevin Seraphin , who came off the bench for 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds and five blocked shots . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Detroit to play the Pistons on Friday .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 140 - 136 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was a wire - to - wire win for Dallas , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Mavericks , as they held Minnesota to 52 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range . The Mavericks also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Minnesota , while committing three less turnovers . The Mavericks ( 1 - 2 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how good they can be . Karl-Anthony Towns did all he could though , as he led the team with 31 points , five rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Derrick Rose was second on the team , finishing with 28 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Wesley Matthews was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 19 points , four rebounds and two assists . Andrew Wiggins was the player of the game , accumulating 26 points , six rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 16 shooting . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 22 points , 10 rebounds , five blocks and two steals .

He went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while also adding five assists and two steals . He went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 14 points , to go along with five assists and two steals . It was a season - high in points for Batum , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Dallas ( 37 - 37 ) had to play this game without Frank Jones ( ankle ) , but they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to pull out a win . Harrison Barnes was second on the team , as he accrued 18 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki was the player of the game , as he collected nine points , two rebounds and two assists on 3 - of - 6 shooting .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 18 - 21 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 17 - 22 ) 126 - 121 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 39 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans finished at 53 percent from the floor and just 43 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets also forced the Pelicans into 19 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Anthony Davis , who went 12 - for - 25 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding 26 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 12 rebounds per game . Jrue Holiday also had a strong showing , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 18 assists over his last two games . DeMarre Carroll was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 19 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 7 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Jarrett Holiday , who came off the bench for 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and four assists . The Nets were led by D'Angelo Russell , who went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding 13 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 12 assists per game . Elfrid Randle also had a strong showing , finishing with 21 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , four assists and two blocked shots . It was his second straight game with 20 points , pushing his season averages to 12 points and 6 assists per game . DeMarre Carroll had a strong showing as well . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding six rebounds and three assists . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Jarrett Holiday , who came off the bench for 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Cleveland to play the Cavaliers on Saturday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 24 - 11 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 9 - 29 ) 115 - 108 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 28 - 24 right away in the first quarter . The Nuggets were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 45 percent from the floor and just 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also forced the Knicks into eight turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nuggets were led by Malik Beasley , who went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and five assists . It was a new season - high in points for Beasley , who 's now scored 20 or more points in four out of his last five games . Nikola Jokic was also a huge factor in the win . He went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was his second triple - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds per game . Enes Kanter had a strong showing as well . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 17 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and two assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Paul Millsap had 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 10 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 10 rebounds over that span . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Mason Plumlee , who had eight points ( 4 - 5 FG ) and seven rebounds in 23 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Thursday , while the Knicks will travel to Los Angeles to play the Lakers on Friday .

As a team , the Pelicans shot a scorching 12 - of - 30 ( 40 percent ) from behind the arc . Nikola Jokic added 20 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , two steals and two blocks on 7 - of - 11 shooting across 21 minutes , while Cheick Diallo recorded a double - double of 12 points and 10 rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . As a team , the Pelicans shot just 42 percent from the field and 28 percent from behind the arc . However , the Pacers ( 47 - 34 ) came in to Sunday 's contest with only seven road wins in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , but the Nets ( 47 - 34 ) were able to pull away in the second half . The Pacers ( 47 - 34 ) were led by Domantas Sabonis 's 17 points , which he supplemented with 12 rebounds and three assists . Joe Harris followed with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Caris LeVert was next with 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Cory Joseph led the bench with 12 points , four assists and three rebounds . Joe Harris was productive as a reserve as well with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . D'Angelo Russell led the way for the Nets with 20 points , six rebounds , six assists and one block . Domantas Sabonis posted a 17 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Thaddeus Young was next with 16 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Joe Harris led the bench with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Caris LeVert was next with 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 12 points , four assists and three rebounds . The Pacers head back home to face off with the Miami Heat on Wednesday night , while the Pacers remain home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday evening as well .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Sacramento Kings , 149 - 129 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday . In a battle between two struggling teams , there were numerous swings in this game . In fact , neither team led by more than 10 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Defense was key for New Orleans , as they held Sacramento to 52 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . New Orleans also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 52 - 39 and the points in the paint differential , 52 - 38 . The Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how bad they can be . Nikola Mirotic was the player of the game , as he tallied 36 points , nine rebounds and two assists on 14 - of - 21 shooting off the bench . Marvin Bagley was second on the team , as he accrued 19 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and seven rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , accumulating 25 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and two blocks in the win . Jrue Holiday recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points , six rebounds and 10 assists .

The Raptors ( 55 - 23 ) came in to Monday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive , as the Magic ( 38 - 40 ) had come in to Monday 's contest with only three road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center . However , the Raptors ( 38 - 23 ) came in to Monday 's contest with only three road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , and the Raptors ( 38 - 40 ) were able to pull away in the second half . The Raptors ( 38 - 23 ) were led by Danny Green 's 29 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist , two steals and three blocks . Kyle Lowry was next with 12 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and a block . Nikola Vucevic posted a 13 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Serge Ibaka totaled 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . Fred VanVleet led the second unit with 10 points , seven assists , two steals and two blocks . The Raptors remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Wednesday versus the New York Knicks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 117 - 109 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday evening . The Raptors ( 38 - 42 ) came in to Sunday looking to snap a four - game losing streak , and they came in losers of three of their last four games . However , the Raptors ( 38 - 42 ) came in to Sunday 's contest with only four road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center . However , the Raptors ( 38 - 42 ) came in to Sunday 's contest with only four road victories in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , and they 'd managed to put together a valiant effort against a Raptors ( 38 - 42 ) squad that had won three of their last four games . However , they 've still won a season - high three games in a row , and have now won five of their last seven games . They were able to pull out a win against a Raptors ( 38 - 42 ) squad that had won five of their last seven games coming into Sunday 's contest . However , it was the dynamic backcourt duo of Dwyane Wade and Pascal Siakam that led the way for the Heat . Wade led the way with 21 points , five assists and three rebounds , while Siakam provided a career - high 23 points , along with 10 rebounds , an assist and a steal . Dion Waiters followed with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic was next with a near double - double of nine points , six assists , five rebounds and a steal . Hassan Whiteside had a near double - double with 14 points , nine boards , a block and a block . James Johnson led the reserves with 18 points , four rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . The Raptors remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again on Tuesday versus the Philadelphia 76ers .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets , 131 - 112 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate these two teams . In fact , there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Defense was key for the Pelicans , as they held the Rockets to 42 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . New Orleans also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Houston , while committing three less turnovers . The Pelicans ( 1 - 1 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just why . Anthony Davis did all he could though , as he led the team with 32 points , 16 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and three blocks . Chris Paul was second on the team , finishing with 19 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Elfrid Payton recorded a triple - double , accumulating 10 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , dropping 21 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . New Orleans will look to play better on Saturday , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers for their next game . The Pelicans ( 1 - 1 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just why . Anthony Davis did all he could though , as he led the team with 32 points , 16 rebounds , eight assists and three steals in the win . E'Twaun Moore was second on the team , as he scored 21 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting off the bench . No other player on the roster had more than 19 points or two rebounds . New Orleans will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Sacramento Kings .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Houston Rockets , 100 - 89 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate the two in the box score . In fact , there were 10 ties and 10 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Utah recording 21 assists to 18 turnovers , while the Rockets committed 15 turnovers to just 16 assists . Utah also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists than Houston , while committing seven less turnovers . The Jazz ( 2 - 2 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how bad they can be . James Harden did all he could though , as he led the team with 29 points , five rebounds and seven assists on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , amassing 10 points and 12 rebounds . Carmelo Anthony was the player of the game , as he accumulated 22 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Eric Gordon was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 11 points , four rebounds and three assists . Joe Ingles was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Jazz is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday .

The Clippers ( 3 - 2 ) came in to Friday 's contest with only three road victories in 39 games away from Barclays Center , but the Clippers ( 10 ) were able to pull out a victory against a Rockets ( 1 - 4 ) squad that had won seven of their last seven games . They were able to keep pace with the Rockets ( 1 - 4 ) in the first half , jumping out to a 31 - 30 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , the Clippers came back with a 39 - point third quarter , and the Clippers ( 1 - 4 ) battled back to make it a two - point game with five seconds remaining . However , the Rockets would n't relinquish the lead , outscoring the Clippers by a 39 - 30 margin over the final 12 minutes . Carmelo Anthony led the way for Los Angeles with 24 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Montrezl Harrell was next with a bench - leading 30 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Clint Capela posted a 14 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two steals and a block . Tobias Harris had a near double - double with 15 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a block . Gerald Green paced the bench with 19 points , five rebounds and an assist . The Clippers remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're home again on Tuesday versus the Portland Trail Blazers .

The Rockets came out and got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 28 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Pelicans were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 51 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets finished at 40 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans were led by the duo of James Harden and Kenneth Faried . Harden went 11 - for - 32 from the field and 6 - for - 18 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 37 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and four steals . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds per game . Faried on the other hand shot 8 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 19 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 38 points and 25 rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Ian Clark , who came off the bench for 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and three rebounds . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Rockets will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 112 - 108 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , the more potent team prevailed . San Antonio ( 10 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and did n't disappoint . In fact , San Antonio led for the entirety of the second half , while holding a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for San Antonio , as they held Minnesota to 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . San Antonio also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Minnesota , while committing 11 less turnovers . The Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just why . Jeff Teague did all he could for Minnesota , as he led the team with 27 points , four assists and two steals on 8 - of - 12 shooting . Jimmy Butler was n't far behind , tallying 23 points , seven rebounds , three assists and four steals of his own . LaMarcus Aldridge recorded a double - double , totaling 21 points , 19 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Andrew Wiggins was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Timberwolves is a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday . The Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how good they can be . DeMar DeRozan once again carried the load , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and four assists in the defeat . Andrew Wiggins was second on the team , finishing with 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . Rudy Gay was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 18 points and seven rebounds . The Spurs will look to play better on Friday , when they host the Cleveland Cavaliers for their next game .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Houston Rockets , 96 - 89 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there were numerous swings in this game . In fact , neither team led by more than 12 points , as it came down to the final seconds . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with San Antonio recording 17 assists to just 15 turnovers , while Houston committed just eight turnovers to just 11 assists . San Antonio also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Houston , while committing three less turnovers . The Spurs ( 7 - 4 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just how scary they can be . James Harden did all he could though , as he led the team with 25 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . LaMarcus Aldridge was second on the team , finishing with 27 points and 10 rebounds . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and 17 rebounds . DeMar DeRozan was the player of the game , accumulating 13 points , 11 rebounds and three assists on 5 - of - 12 shooting . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 125 - 87 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . In a battle between two of the best offenses in the NBA , the Spurs were able to prevail with a huge road win . In fact , San Antonio led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , as they never relinquished their lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with San Antonio recording 25 assists to 11 turnovers , while Los Angeles committed 17 turnovers to just 21 assists . San Antonio also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Los Angeles , while committing just 11 turnovers . The Spurs ( 15 - 14 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and wins like this show just why . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for Los Angeles , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds , two steals and one assist on 12 - of - 14 shooting . Tobias Harris was second on the team , as he accrued 17 points , five rebounds and two assists off the bench . Avery Bradley was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 15 points , three rebounds and three assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Toronto Raptors , 125 - 107 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , the San Antonio offense prevailed in a near wire - to - wire win for San Antonio , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for San Antonio , as they held Toronto to 45 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover differential was huge as well , with San Antonio recording 32 assists to 10 turnovers , while Toronto matched their assists and turnovers at 10 a piece . The Spurs ( 22 - 12 ) have now won five of their last seven games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the west . Kawhi Leonard was the player of the game , as he tallied 21 points , five assists and two steals in the defeat . DeMar DeRozan recorded a triple - double , accumulating 21 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists . Norman Powell started for DeRozan and finished with 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Fred VanVleet was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . On deck for the Raptors is a home matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday .

Derrick Adams was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 19 points , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 20 - 23 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 25 - 20 ) 108 - 93 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Hornets got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 28 - 24 right away in the first quarter . The Hornets were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 47 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Spurs finished at 46 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who went 13 - for - 27 from the field and 7 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding five assists and two steals . It was his second 30 - point performance in a row , as he 's combined for 49 points and 22 assists over his last two games . Derrick Kidd-Gilchrist had a strong showing as well , finishing with 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Derrick Lamb , who came off the bench for 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 6 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 12 rebounds per game . DeRozan on the other hand shot 11 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Patty Mills had 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) of his own , to go along with two rebounds and an assist . It was his second straight game with 14 points , pushing his season average to 14 points per game . Nicolas Batum had a very quiet game , going 3 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score seven points in 30 minutes . It was his second game in a row with seven or more points , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Thursday , while the Spurs will travel to Dallas to play the Mavericks on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 103 - 95 , at AT & T Center on Sunday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate these two in the box score . In fact , neither team led by more than 10 points , as it came down to the final seconds . The Clippers offense was on point , as they shot 46 percent from the field , 52 percent from the free - throw line and 52 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 23 assists to 11 turnovers , while the Spurs committed 18 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Clippers ( 25 - 21 ) have now won seven of their last eight games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the west . LaMarcus Aldridge did all he could for San Antonio , as he led the team with 30 points and 14 rebounds on 13 - of - 21 shooting . Patrick Beverley recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and four steals . Tobias Harris was a huge spark off the bench , providing 27 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and three steals . The Clippers will look to keep rolling on Tuesday against the Dallas Mavericks .

In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , there was n't much to differentiate the two in the box score . The Spurs ( 29 - 22 ) have now won five - straight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . LaMarcus Aldridge was the player of the game , as he tallied 30 points , nine rebounds and six assists on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Bradley Beal was second on the team , finishing with 21 points , four rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Trevor Ariza was huge off the bench , providing 20 points , four rebounds and two steals on 6 - of - 17 shooting .

The Phoenix Suns defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 100 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was a wire - to - wire win for Phoenix , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Suns , as they held Dallas to 43 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The Suns also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 44 - 38 and the points in the paint differential , 44 - 38 . Devin Booker was the player of the game , accumulating 35 points , four rebounds and seven assists on 12 - of - 19 shooting . Trevor Ariza was second on the team , finishing with 21 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . Deandre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 12 rebounds .

The Lakers also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Phoenix , while committing two less turnovers . Warren , who went 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . The Chicago Bulls ( 20 - 52 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 55 ) 116 - 101 on Monday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 34 - 20 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Bulls shot extremely well in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 46 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . Along with the hot start , the Bulls also forced the Suns into 14 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Deandre Booker , who went 9 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds and seven assists . It was a season - high in points for Booker , who 's now scored 20 or more points in each of his last three games . Zach LaVine had a strong showing as well . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding eight rebounds and seven assists . It was a season - high in points for LaVine , who 's only reached double figures in points four other times this season . Coming off the bench , Josh Daniels chipped in with 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and three rebounds in 16 minutes . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 37 - 34 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 56 ) 118 - 98 on Thursday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 29 - 18 right away in the first quarter . The Pistons were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns finished at 48 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . The Pistons were led by Wayne Ellington , who went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding a game - high of 11 rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Ellington , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . The Mavericks came out and got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 31 - 24 right away in the first quarter . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder finished at 39 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . The Mavericks were led by Paul George , who went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 12 rebounds . Westbrook , on the other hand , went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and 11 assists . It was his second straight impressive performance , as he 's combined for 44 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . Steven Adams recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 20 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 45 points and 19 rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Jalen on the other hand shot 10 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 18 points , while also adding eight rebounds and four assists . It was a season - high in points for Adams , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was n't all good for the guard . Dwight Powell had a solid showing as well . He went 4 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 11 points , to go along with nine rebounds in 28 minutes . It was his second straight game with 11 points , pushing his season average to 11 points per game . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Devin Harris , who came off the bench for 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 16 minutes . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday .

The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 35 - 19 right away in the first quarter . The Timberwolves were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 46 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , to go along with 18 rebounds , two steals and four blocked shots in 35 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 11 rebounds per game . Andrew Wiggins also played a factor in the win , finishing with 28 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 7 - 11 FT ) , five rebounds and a block . It was his second impressive game in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 14 assists over his last two games . Jeff Teague had a strong showing as well , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , six rebounds and 11 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 14 points and 11 assists per game . Coming off the bench , Brandon Ingram chipped in with 13 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and two blocked shots . The Lakers were led by Lance Stephenson , who went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score a team - high of 14 points , while also adding five rebounds and six assists . It was a new season - high in points for Stephenson , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Michael Beasley had 11 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , five rebounds , one assist and one steal in 20 minutes . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday , while the Lakers will travel to Dallas to play the Mavericks on Monday .

The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 30 - 34 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 39 - 25 ) 131 - 120 on Tuesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 30 - 24 right away in the first quarter . The Timberwolves were able to shoot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder finished at 45 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from deep . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who went 15 - for - 27 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 41 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and two steals . It was his second straight double - double , as he 's combined for 59 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Jeff Teague had a strong showing as well . He went 5 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding 12 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 48 points and 12 assists over his last two games . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Dennis Schroder , who came off the bench for 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five assists in 29 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday .

However , the Timberwolves ( 27 - 39 ) came in to Saturday 's contest with only seven road wins in 24 tries away from Barclays Center , and they faced a formidable challenge against the Timberwolves ( 27 - 39 ) on Saturday night . Minnesota was led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who posted a game - high 40 points , along with 15 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Trevor Ariza followed with 27 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jabari Parker was next with 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Bobby Portis posted a 21 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Taj Gibson posted a 15 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included a trio of blocks . Jeff Green was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , five rebounds , three steals and a block . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Monday versus the New York Knicks .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 30 ) 111 - 101 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 30 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Trail Blazers were able to hold on for the victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 40 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were able to force the Knicks into 19 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Trail Blazers were led by Jusuf Nurkic , who went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 20 points , while also adding eight rebounds in 19 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this season . Damian Lillard added 17 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) of his own , to go along with nine assists and four rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 assists on the season . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Noah Vonleh , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Oakland to play the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday .

The Trail Blazers came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Bulls 39 - 27 , therefore securing the victory in front of their home crowd . The Trail Blazers were able to shoot 57 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls finished at 46 percent from the floor and just 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were able to shoot 57 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls finished at 46 percent . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . Lillard went 4 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 16 points , while also adding 10 assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 assists on the season . McCollum on the other hand shot 7 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . It was a new season - high in points for him , as he 's averaging only 11 points per game on the season . Zach LaVine had a strong showing as well . He went 6 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 assists on the season . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 21 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 32 - 25 ) 127 - 118 on Thursday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 39 - 23 right away in the first quarter . The Trail Blazers came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Spurs 39 - 23 to finish the game and steal the victory in front of their home crowd . The Trail Blazers were able to shoot 54 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Spurs finished at 53 percent from the floor and a meager 57 percent from deep . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . Lillard went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 0 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding nine assists and five steals . He 's been on a roll of late , averaging 24 points and 10 assists over his last three games . McCollum on the other hand shot 10 - for - 21 from the field and 7 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for McCollum , who 's only reached double figures in points twice this year , so it was good to see him get back on track . LaMarcus Aldridge also had a solid showing . He went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 17 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 10 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Jusuf Nurkic added 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , three rebounds , six assists and two blocked shots . He 's now averaging 22 points and 5 assists on the season . Rodney Hood had a strong showing as well , finishing with 14 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and three rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday , while the Spurs will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Saturday .

The Boston Celtics ( 49 - 33 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 32 - 50 ) 116 - 110 on Tuesday at the Verizon Center in Washington . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 25 - 15 right away in the first quarter . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 42 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . Along with the hot hand , the Celtics finished at 45 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 42 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . The Celtics were led by the duo of Terry Rozier and Bradley Beal . Rozier went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 21 points , while also adding four assists and four rebounds . It was a new season - high in points for him , as he 's only averaging 17 points per game on the season . Beal on the other hand went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's been on a roll of late , averaging 17 points and 6 assists over his last three games . Ian Mahinmi had a strong showing as well . He went 4 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 11 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Wizard to reach double figures in points was Bobby Portis , who came off the bench for 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds .
